title: our first trip together
description: Our first trip together to Jibhi after the election season. We went with Enactus together and stayed in a cozy cottage by the river.

title: you said no to my proposal
description: We met near the reading section around 5PM. You smiled first.

title: you said yes to my proposal
description: You took me the same bench. We chatted a lot and then you said yes. It was a beautiful moment.

title: our first fight
description: We argued on Jwala's house day. Argued on the road to Himadri.

title: watching meteor shower together
description: We lay on the terrace of Himadri Hostel and watched the shooting stars for hours.

title: Abhigya's birthday surprise
description: Midnight cake cutting with fairy lights in the common room. Harshit gifted a handwritten letter and a plant.

title: our first kiss
description: It was after the Holi event near SAC. Unexpected and magical.

title: first call that lasted all night
description: Started talking at 10PM and stayed on call till sunrise.

title: our first month done
description: Well we forgot about it..and you messaged me on 8th March celebrated our first anniversary with a special dinner at the campus canteen, reminiscing about our journey together.

title: this was our first date
description: We went to Hauz Khas Village to a really nice restaurant, with good food and loud music.We had pasta and Garlic Bread.

title: the day I first saw you
description: The day we first met at the library, both reaching for the same book.

title: the day we sat together and saw the stars
description: Sat together near a bonfire at Jibhi, sharing stories and watching the stars.

title: first meeting in MTL101
description: Saw you in LH527 during MTL101 wearing traditionals; you were shining in my eyes

title: you said no to my proposal
description: Outside the reading section around 5 PM, you gently turned me down but smiled first.

title: you said yes!, to my proposal
description: The day you finally said yes and we started dating officially.

title: first date (bakery run)
description: Valentine’s week pastry date—our first official outing as a couple.

title: This was our first trip together – Jibhi
description: Getaway with Enactus to a riverside cottage after election season.

description: Asked you about ELP viva questions late at night; you helped instantly.

title: I asked you about speaker ke auditions
description: Chatted about your speaker-audition experience before mine.

description: You sent me a Spotify Blend link—our first shared playlist.

description: Filled Business & Consulting Club forms and debated vertical choices.

description: Shared Flipkart Grid case-comp links at midnight.

description: You told me the quiz results; I lamented not clearing HiveMinds.

description: Playfully begged you to make me admin and joked about betrayal.

title: started competition deck
description: Agreed to meet next day with Mayan to build the case deck before the 28th deadline.

description: Late-night spat with Shivam; asked you to mediate and met at CCD.

description: Shared a Figma link while designing our pitch slides.

description: Ran from Himadri to the library in four minutes to hold seats.

description: Watched Shub’s team in Accenture Strategy finals together.

title: work-review prep scare
description: Warned you that reviewers were strict; advised notebooks for work review.

description: Asked you for a nice photo to use in our deck; you obliged.

description: Moved seats so we could sit side-by-side during roll call.

description: Vinay roped us into handling Enactus Instagram; scheduled a late meet.

description: You sent multiple vermicompost photos for Trijha marketing.

description: Movie got canceled; instead we grabbed seats together in your HUL lecture.

description: You forwarded semiconductor lecture slides while we studied.

description: Shared stats claiming 71 % efficiency rise—sparked a mini research dive.

description: Fixed competition video after dinner; promised to upload from my account.

description: Launched our shared ‘Team-Harshit’ Figma for designs.

description: Hustled to finish a Reel for Enactus; you edited from Ex-Hall.

description: Offered you my COL106 solution when you were swamped.

title: competition research grind
description: You feared endless quizzes; we split research tasks late at night.

title: work-review deck revisions
description: Stayed up tweaking deck after reviewers slept through calls.

description: Invited you to SDA; you chose library instead—classic study over food.

title: promise-3 apology night
description: I apologized for wasting your time and reminded you of Promise 3.

description: You begged me to end the lingering cold war between us.

description: Wrote outreach mail for Trijha pots as sustainable BCG gifts.

description: Proposed registering for SIH after minors; shared the link.

description: You teased me for doing Enactus work loudly in the library.

description: Night hackathon catch-up while you studied elsewhere.

description: Forwarded strict entry rules—no ID, no entry—just before the fresher event.

description: You went offline due to guests; I covered for you in a meet.

description: Vinay paired us to explore piezoelectric materials for Enactus.

description: Celebrated when you secured MSL303 in the add-drop scramble.

description: Plotted pastry run before the bakery closed at 7 PM.

description: Spun a funny fairy-tale to explain why I delete messages.

description: Dashed to library in four minutes to retrieve my misplaced items.

description: Discussed 5000-char SOP limits and form progress.

description: Tried to grab dinner post-lab; you chose library again.

description: You woke at 5 : 40 AM yelling ‘Earthquake!’ and we joked about bed-shaking.

title: apology-spam & sorry marathon
description: Typed “SORRY” letter-by-letter after missing your calls.

description: Teased me to Google ‘romance’; we edited your love letter until 4 AM.

description: You got a yes from Prof. Maass; we drafted celebratory mails together.

title: wish scholarship reminder
description: You asked me to remind you about the WISH application deadline.

description: Shared explicit role-play texts—our most intimate conversation yet.

title: four-month anniversary
description: You sent a heartfelt ‘Happy 4 months!’ message near midnight.

description: You struggled to focus on a movie while texting me about EDC calls.

title: late-morning wake-up tease
description: You bragged about waking at 7 AM while I slept in.

description: Discussed dreams, reels, and weekend study plans before my EDC meet.

description: Late-night text about an ELP viva kicked off our conversation history.

title: first voice call that ran past midnight
description: Talked 45 minutes straight, exchanging memes and exam panic in equal measure.

title: first study session side-by-side in the library
description: Shifted seats during roll-call so we could share notes (and inside jokes).

description: Blended our music tastes with a Spotify Blend invite.

description: Agreed to register together and exchanged Unstop invites within seconds.

description: Stayed up past 3 AM polishing a pitch deck before the deadline.

title: first minor argument / cold war
description: A spat over group work led to a day of silence and awkward emojis.

title: first heartfelt apology
description: I spelled S-O-R-R-Y one letter at a time until you forgave me.

title: first playful admin-rights tussle
description: Begged you to make me group admin, then joked about staging a coup.

title: first time you chose library over dinner plans
description: I invited you to SDA; you picked study time—classic priorities.

title: first case-comp quiz result celebration
description: Shared scores and consoled each other when one of us missed the cut.

description: Designed slides in real time while laughing on chat.

description: Dropped a 9 PM Meet link so the whole crew could sync online.

title: first emergency ‘submit my lab report’ request
description: You sent login creds from Manali; I filed the report on campus.

title: first exam-day pep talk
description: Sent a heart emoji and ‘You’ve got this!’ just before your mid-sem.

title: first library guard scolding together
description: Got kicked upstairs at 2 : 45 AM for making too much noise.

title: first grand birthday surprise plan
description: Co-ordinated a midnight wake-up for a friend’s birthday—complete with code words.

title: first travel-while-texting marathon
description: You live-blogged the bus ride, mountain memes included.

title: first time we handled SAC campaign brainstorming
description: Dumped a rapid-fire issues list: healthcare, drains, library hours, and more.

title: first internship application sprint
description: Queued a dozen professor emails after you yelled ‘Send EVERYTHING!’.

title: first mock-interview coaching
description: Practiced case questions and timed answers in the dorm corridor.

title: first joint Instagram Reel edit
description: Met at Ex-Hall post-dinner to trim clips and add captions.

title: first missed-call apology marathon
description: Typed sorry multiple ways after ignoring your late-night ring.

title: first inside joke turned group meme
description: Threatened to ‘throw you in the sea’—became our go-to dramatic line.

title: first train-ticket booking help
description: Secured your 6 : 55 AM seat the minute bookings opened.

title: first time borrowing notes before an exam
description: You forwarded lecture slides and saved my revision schedule.

title: first shared victory selfie
description: Snapped a photo after submitting the competition deck exactly at deadline.

title: first mutual ‘let’s skip this meeting’ pact
description: Debated whether to ditch an Enactus call to finish coursework instead.

title: first early-morning earthquake scare
description: You woke me at 5 : 40 AM screaming ‘Earthquake!’—turns out it was mild.

title: first shared pastry date
description: Celebrated Valentine’s week with chocolate pastries before the bakery closed.

title: first remote-work coordination day
description: Planned how you’d start in-person then switch to remote for the internship.

title: first time sending a long romantic letter
description: Googled ‘how to be romantic’, then edited until 4 AM.

title: first mutual playlist binge
description: Spent a whole evening swapping song recommendations and rating each track.

title: first shared code debugging session
description: Hunted a ‘list index out of range’ bug side-by-side on VS Code Live Share.

title: first spontaneous coffee dash
description: Left the library in pouring rain just to grab a latte together.

title: first late-night meme exchange streak
description: Kept sending memes past 2 AM, each one funnier than the last.

title: first serious career-path talk
description: Discussed VC vs. research over a 30-minute voice note chain.

title: first time covering each other in a meeting
description: You had guests over; I presented your part on the Zoom call.

title: first big sibling-advice request
description: You helped draft a heartfelt 30th-birthday note for my sister in Denmark.

title: first public-speaking practice
description: Rehearsed your speaker-audition pitch while timing you with a stopwatch.

title: first time we joked about admin power
description: Threatened to rename the group if granted admin rights—pure chaos.

title: first collective ‘all-nighter’ promise
description: Swore we’d stay awake until every slide was perfect—coffee on standby.

title: first shared Netflix-but-studying exchange
description: You tried watching a movie with your sister while texting me about EDC calls.

title: first “wake-up challenge” bet
description: Bragged about getting up at 7 AM; I overslept and owed you chai.

title: first time trading login credentials (trust milestone)
description: Gave you my email password so you could upload the competition reel—strict privacy rules invoked!

description: Did a celebratory video call after surviving the case-comp finals audience session.

title: first accidental message delete and cover story
description: Invented a Beauty-and-the-Beast tale to explain why I hit delete by mistake.

title: first time agreeing on a restaurant instantly
description: Both typed ‘CCD?’ at the exact same second—screenshot proof.

title: first mini-hackathon together
description: Met at 10 PM, coded till sunrise, and survived on Maggi.

title: first shared panic over entry rules
description: Rallied the crew with ‘no-ID, no-entry’ warnings before the event started.

title: first mentor shout-out
description: I cheered when you received an internship offer; drafted thanks mail together.

title: first four-month anniversary message
description: You texted ‘Happy 4 months!’ near midnight—time flies.
